snippet: “Up and Away,” an immersive work inspired by Jules Verne’s “Around the World in 80 Days,” will open next fall, with previews in the spring.
abstract: “Up and Away,” an immersive work inspired by Jules Verne’s “Around the World in 80 Days,” will open next fall, with previews in the spring.

headline.main: Lincoln Center Plans a Theater Work for Children With Autism
headline.print_headline: A Theater Work For Children With Autism
